originalText.text: I just wanna I have known and have been seeing Dr. Levinson for over 8 years now and he's not just an amazing Doctor but also a great person as well. Very caring understand and just a genuine person. Love his approach on care giving. I would recommend him to anyone who needs an amazing Doctor. My best experience as patient with any doctor by far. Thank you for everything.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr Levinson for many years. I really appreciate his approach to treatment.  He takes the time to compassionately understand my medical issues and sort them out with wisdom and experience.  Every time I visit his office there is a constant tempo of patients but I never feel rushed.  The best part is that he makes me feel "all better".....

He takes the time to compassionately understand my medical issues and sort them out with wisdom and experience. originalText.text: Dr. Levinson has been caring for me since Nov. 2014, after my c-spine surgery.  He is the most kind and compassionate physician I have ever had, and have recommended him to many friends.  I am never rushed and he listens carefully to help find useful suggestions to improve my quality of life.  In addition, he has taken the Medical Marijuana certification, and have found his use of this treatment very helpful. He is open to new ideas, but uses his years of impeccable judgement to guide his patients to the most beneficial therapy based on each patient's needs!

originalText.text: Dr.Levinson is the man. Personable, caring and knows his learned craft. I wholeheartedly recommend him. I have known him over 20 years. Great Doctor, and most importantly Man. From Randy Booker.

text.text: Dr.Levinson is the man. Personable, caring and knows his learned craft. I wholeheartedly recommend him. I have known him over 20 years. Great Doctor, and most importantly Man. From Randy Booker.

originalText.text: I had pain from two herniated disks.  Dr. Levinson was able to solve my issue without my having to resort to an epidural or surgery.  He truly listened to my symptoms, thoroughly reviewed and explained the findings on MRIs, and was willing to think outside the box to solve the issue.  I highly recommend him to others.
